entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Articque has significantly increased its billings recurring contribution from 59% in FY18A to 72% in FY21A, hitting 82% in FY22L. The rise in recurring revenue is largely attributable to the change in business model towards a subscription model (launch of CDO and M2S transition of AP) and the ramp-up of CDO & AP. Articque promotes a recurring Consulting package.
entities.growthStrategySummary: Transition to a subscription model, M2S transition for AP, ramp-up of CDO & AP, promotion of recurring consulting packages.

entities.name: ChapsVision
entities.description: Mentioned in the document footer in relation to Project Inuk.
Transaction context involving Articque, potentially with ChapsVision, as per document footer 'Project Inuk - ChapsVision - Strictly Private & Confidential'.

entities.name: CDO
entities.description: Launched as part of Articque's business model change towards subscription. Experienced ramp-up.

entities.name: AP
entities.description: Underwent M2S (Maintenance to Subscription) transition as part of Articque's strategy. Experienced ramp-up. Non-recurring revenues of AP decreased due to favoring subscription over perpetual licenses.

entities.name: Carticque & Geoservices
entities.description: Additional key features of the Articque platform. Followed similar trend to CDO & AP, with a slight slow in FY22L.

entities.name: Legacy Licenses
entities.description: Residuals of former product CDD. Expected to die out completely in FY23BP.

entities.name: Consulting
entities.description: Experienced cyclical variations in revenue. Declined by €200k in FY22L, partly due to the two-year development cycle of large projects and Articque's recent switch towards promoting recurring Consulting packages.

entities.name: Miscellaneous Revenue Stream
entities.description: Includes non-material trading revenue. Significantly dropped from €160k in FY18A to €54k in FY22L. Expected to remain negligible from FY23 onwards.

entities.name: Training
entities.description: Training revenues remained stable over FY18A-22L.

entities.name: CDD
entities.description: Former product of Articque, of which Legacy Licenses are residuals.
